data.text: Atali, Manga Axasiya nga to a to, a diin bata faxa, a keli a yi yamarin fi a mangan bɔnsɔnna birin xa faxa.

Koni e to yi e faxa feni, Yehoseba, Manga Yehorami a dii tɛmɛna, Axasiya xunyɛn yi Axasiyaa dii xɛmɛn Yowasa tongo, a yi a ba mangana diine yɛ, benun e xa e faxa. A yi a luxun konkona nde kui sadene yi dɛnaxan yi e nun ɲaxanla naxan diin masuxuma. A sa luxun Atali ma na kii nin, a mi a faxa.
A yi lu luxunxi Yehoseba fɛma ɲɛɛ sennin Alatala Batu Banxini. Atali nan yi mangayani na yamanani.

Ɲɛɛ solofere dangu xanbini, Yehoyada yi xɛrane rasiga Kereti sofa kuntigine nun mangan makantan sofane xilideni, a yi fa e ra a fɛma Alatalaa banxini. A yi layirin xidi e tagi, a yi e rakɔlɔ Alatalaa banxini, a yi mangana diin yita e ra.
Na xanbi ra, a yi yamarini itoe so e yii, a naxa, “Ɛ ito nan ligama. Naxanye lanma e xa wali Matabu Lɔxɔni ɛ yɛ, ndee sigama mangana banxin nan kantande yi,
ndee Suri dɛɛn na, ndee dɛɛn naxan kantan tiine xanbi ra. Ɛ birin luma ɛ masarɛ ikiini banxin kantandeni.
Ɛ gali bode firinna, naxanye mi walima Matabu Lɔxɔni, ne kantanna tima Alatala Batu Banxini mangan yireni.
Ɛ mangan nabilinma nɛn yiren birin yi, yɛngɛ so seene ɛ birin yii, naxan yo na a maso ɛ safan na, ɛ na faxama nɛn. Ɛ luma nɛn mangan yireni, a nɛma sigɛ yire yo yi.”

Saraxaraliin Yehoyadaa yamarin naxanye birin fi sofa kuntigine ma, e ne liga. E birin yi e sofane tongo, naxanye yi e wanla danma Matabu Lɔxɔni e nun naxanye yi a fɔlɔma Matabu Lɔxɔni, e siga saraxarali Yehoyada fɛma.
Saraxaraliin yi tanbane nun yɛ masansan wure lefane so sofa kuntigine yii naxanye yi kelixi Manga Dawuda yii Alatala Batu Banxini.
Sofane yi mangan nabilin yɛngɛ so seene e birin yii, e ti fɔlɔ banxin yiifari fɔxɔni han a kɔmɛn fɔxɔni saraxa ganden nun Ala Batu Banxin yɛtagi.

Saraxaraliin Yehoyada yi mangana diin maso, a yi mangaya taxamaseri kɔmɔtin nun sereya kɛdin so a yii. E yi a sugandi, e a findi mangan na, e yi e yiine bɔnbɔ, e naxa, “Ala xa sii xunkuyen fi mangan ma!”
Atali yi sofane nun yamaan xuiin mɛ, a yi fa yamaan fɛma Alatalaa banxini.

A yi mangan to tixi sɛnbɛtɛnna dɛxɔn so dɛɛn na, fata namunna ra. Sofa kuntigine nun xɔta fene yi tixi mangan fɛma, yamaan birin yi sɛwaxi, e yi xɔtaan fema. Koni, Atali yi a domani bɔ a ma, a gbelegbele, a naxa, “Yanfana! Yanfana!”

Nayi, saraxaraliin Yehoyada yi yamarin fi sofa kuntigine ma naxanye yi sofa ganla xunna ra, a naxa, “Ɛ a ramini yamaan fari ma, naxan na bira a fɔxɔ ra, ɛ na faxa silanfanna ra.” Amasɔtɔ saraxaraliin bata yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ nama a faxa Alatala Batu Banxini.”
E yi a suxu, e siga a ra manga banxin binni soone soon kiraan naxan xɔn, e sa a faxa mɛnni.
Yehoyada yi layirin xidi Alatala nun mangan nun yamaan tagi, alogo na yamaan xa findi Alatalaa yamaan na, a mɔn yi lanna raso mangan nun yamaan tagi.

Yamanan yamaan birin yi so Baali batu banxini, e a kala, e yi saraxa gandene nun sawurane kala, e yi Matan faxa saraxa ganden yɛtagi, Baali kii muxuna. Saraxarali Yehoyada yi kantan tiine dɔxɔ Alatala Batu Banxini.

A yi Kereti sofa kuntigin e nun sofane tongo, e nun yamanan yamaan birin, e yi mangan nagodo Alatala Batu Banxini, e so manga banxini kantan tiine so dɛɛn kiraan xɔn ma. Nayi, Yowasa yi dɔxɔ mangane gbɛdɛni.
Yamanan yamaan birin yi sɛwani. Taan yi xunbeli Atali faxa xanbini silanfanna ra manga banxini.
